languages.text: "Моя многоуважаемая предшественница погибла от рук культистов, да испепелит Император их души".
"My esteemed predecessor died at the hands of cultists, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."
languages.original_text: "Моя многоуважаемая предшественница погибла от рук культистов, да испепелит Император их души".

traits.locale_text: "My esteemed predecessor has died at the hands of pirates, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."
"My esteemed predecessor has died at the hands of pirates, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."
"My esteemed predecessor died at the hands of pirates, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."
"My esteemed predecessor died at the hands of pirates, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."
"My esteemed predecessor died at the hands of cultists, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."
"My esteemed predecessor died at the hands of pirates, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."

languages.text: "Meine geschätzte Vorgängerin ist durch die Hände von Kultisten gestorben, möge der Imperator ihre Seelen einäschern."
languages.original_text: "My esteemed predecessor died at the hands of cultists, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."

traits.locale_text: "Meine geschätzte Vorgängerin ist durch die Hände von Piraten gestorben, möge der Imperator ihre Seelen einäschern."

languages.text: « Mon estimée prédécesseure a été tuée par des cultistes. Puisse l'Empereur incinérer leurs âmes. »
languages.original_text: "My esteemed predecessor died at the hands of cultists, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."

traits.locale_text: « Mon estimée prédécesseure a été tuée par des pirates. Puisse l'Empereur incinérer leurs âmes. »

languages.text: “尊敬的前任行商浪人被邪教徒害死了。愿帝皇的烈焰将那些恶棍的灵魂化为灰烬。”
languages.original_text: "My esteemed predecessor died at the hands of cultists, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."

traits.locale_text: “尊敬的前任行商浪人被海盗害死了。愿帝皇的烈焰将那些恶棍的灵魂化为灰烬。”

languages.text: 「尊敬する先代は魔女団の手で殺された。皇帝よ、奴らの魂を燃やし尽くしたまえ」
languages.original_text: "My esteemed predecessor died at the hands of cultists, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."

traits.locale_text: 「尊敬する先代は海賊の手で殺された。皇帝よ、奴らの魂を燃やし尽くしたまえ」

languages.text: «Mi estimada predecesora murió a manos de cultistas. Que el Emperador incinere sus almas»
languages.original_text: "My esteemed predecessor died at the hands of cultists, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."

traits.locale_text: Mi estimada predecesora murió a manos de piratas. Que el Emperador incinere sus almas»

languages.text: "Saygın selefim, tarikatçıların elinde can verdi. İmparator, o korsanların ruhlarını yakıp kül etsin."
languages.original_text: "My esteemed predecessor died at the hands of cultists, may the Emperor incinerate their souls."

traits.locale_text: "Saygın selefim, tarikatçıların elinde can verdi. İmparator, o korsanların ruhlarını yakıp kül etsin."
